summary.executive_summary: This urban planning simulation indicates good traffic flow with moderate costs. The addition of new infrastructure has improved traffic efficiency while maintaining reasonable costs.
key_findings: Traffic flow has improved with an average travel time of 12.3 minutes.
Total project cost estimated at $7,500,000 ($750 per capita).
New road infrastructure has reduced congestion by 25%.
recommendations: Monitor traffic patterns after implementation to validate improvements.
Consider additional public transportation options to further reduce vehicle dependency.
Regular monitoring and reporting of key metrics.
Community engagement on planning decisions and impacts.
